Description:
1. Choose whichever faction you like.
2. Select a random faction as rival (can't be the same as 1.)
3. Shuffle and place the 3 Ground-Floor Rooms and place 1 Guest from your assisting faction (1.) at each.
4. Remove the Guests from your rival
5. Shuffle the remaining 9 Guests to form the Guest deck.
Name: Notecard
